summary.span: 创建 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 元素的特定于主题的外观。

span.span: Creates the theme-specific look for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.

summary.span: 定义 和 元素的外观。

span.span: A defines the appearance of and elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实际的外观取决于用户的系统上的活动的主题。The actual appearance of the is dependent on which theme is active on the user's system. 此类属性允许[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]来设置基于当前主题的外观。The properties of this class allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to set the appearance based on the current theme. 在 XAML 用法中，对象元素还可以有子内容，可以是单个，用于设置属性。In XAML usage, a object element can also have child content, which can be a single that sets the property. ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `theme:` Xmlns 前缀CLR 命名空间。An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace. 通常情况下，xmlns 前缀和映射 （未显示） 的 XAML 根元素中定义。Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时，此属性才适用是或。This property only applies when the is a or . 如果使用项目符号的对象支持`IsThreeState`属性，并且该属性的值是`true`，然后值`null`由潜在用户设置。If the object used for the bullet supports an `IsThreeState` property, and the value of that property is `true`, then a value of `null` is potentially user-settable. 否则为值不能设置为`null`由用户操作，但它可以设置标记或代码中通过这种方式。Otherwise, the value of cannot be set to `null` by user action, but it can be set that way in markup or code. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`| （但是，可能未设置此属性是所有主题中） (however, this property might not be set in all themes)| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
